title.rendered: SEO Tips That Every Web Designers Should Know

content.rendered:
These days it isn’t just the experts in SEO that should know some tips, but web designers should also know them as well. This is because a good website is made up of plenty of different pieces like web design, quality content and more. Essentially this means that creating the website for your customer isn’t just about the design that you see on the computer these days, but it should also be working for your mobile devices as well. Here are just a few tips that the web designers should know just as well as the SEO services experts.

Structure of the Site

The structure of the site is one of the things that you should always think about, even as a website designer. You should have a good flow that is easy to understand and all of the main pages should have clear links to them. The general rule of thumb is that any page shouldn’t be over 4 clicks from the main page or else the viewer is going to lose interest quickly. Ensure that the site is simple, yet professional and can be used easily without having to click a lot to get where you need to go.

Responsive and Mobile Friendly Design

Also, these days one of the main things that you need to make sure that you are doing when you are creating a website is making sure that it is a mobile-friendly and responsive design. This is because most people are doing their searches on their phones and if the site doesn’t look good on the phone, then they won’t visit it again. You can do this easily by using some tools that will let you know what it looks like. However, never forget to do this because then you the customer is going to be missing out on potential income and more clients.

High-Quality Content

One of the things that should be thought about by the designer as well as the owner of the website is the content. You want to have high-quality content, but that doesn’t only mean that articles, blogs, and press releases can be used. There are plenty of other options that can be used, including videos, images, animation and more. Ensure that you consider this when you are having your site created for you and your requirements.

Image Optimization

Image optimization is something that is very important and you want to ensure that you are choosing the right visuals for your site. There are numerous things that you would need to think about, such as:

  • Symmetry
  • Geometric patterns
  • Fonts
  • Colors
  • Patterns

All of these should be used when required and you should make sure that they look good. However, you would need to optimize these images into smaller sizes so that they can be loaded easily and faster. This can be done by either making the sizes of the images smaller or by using a script or plugin for them.

Fast Loading Page

You should always ensure that the website that you are working on loads quickly since if it doesn’t, then the client is more likely to visit another site. You should check this out when you have done some changes to the site since this is something that is extremely critical. This also means that you should think about who is hosting it and how fast the response time is from the server. If your site is slow in terms of loading, including the images, videos, and other items, then it is highly likely that you are going to lose potential visitors.

Also, Read – How Web Design Impact Customer Experience?

Proper Tools

There are plenty of tools that are available these days that any web designer can use to create a site, but you want to ensure that you are using the right ones. One of the tools that you should consider using is one that would tell you how fast the site is loading, which is extremely important. Also, you can use a tool that will help you to determine whether or not your site is responsive enough and how it will look on various sizes of mobile devices and tablets. All of these tools can make your job easier and ensure that the site is SEO compatible.

Not only should the SEO experts be thinking about the website and how it is designed, but the designer also needs to make sure that the site is SEO compatible. This can be done in a wide variety of ways, including ensuring that it is fully mobile responsive. Also, if the site doesn’t load quickly, then that needs to be fixed and you can find some great tools to help you with this work. Make sure to follow these tools to ensure that the site is ready and SEO optimized for your client and their needs.
